abstract: Editorial applauds programs and ideas proposed by New York Chief Judge Jonathan Lippmann aimed at helping low-income people obtain legal help necessary to deal with serious and life-altering cases; calls proposals step toward making court system more equitable and accessible.
lead_paragraph: The state’s chief judge has come up with innovative ideas and programs to close the “justice gap.”

headline.main: Bold Plans for New York Courts
